# Draft:Kingdom of the Happy Land

The Kingdom of the Happy Land was an African American utopian community founded in the late 19th century on the border of North and South Carolina, in and around Henderson County. The Kingdom was settled by family members of a group of  freed Black Americans who had traveled north from Mississippi.
Source
Refugees from South Carolina
Robert and Luella Montgomery
Background
Establishment
The Kingdom of the Happy Land
Decline
In popular culture
Dolen Perkins-Valdez's 2025 novel Happy Land is set in the community.
